items.sentence: We drove around the block three times, looking for a place to park.
He decided that his kielbasa was too dignified for an ordinary bun.
Tom is writing a book, but he hasn't yet decided on a title for it.
Tom referred me to you, saying that you're the best lawyer in town.
One of the first things we need to do is find out what his name is.
Tom didn't realize that Mary shouldn't be doing what she was doing.
The boys' room is on the right, and the girls' room is on the left.
A priest skillfully drew a picture of a priest on a folding screen.
Tom promised to pay me three hundred dollars if I did that for him.
Tom forwarded the email message that he received from Mary to John.
